title: Hearts

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, Select 3 other players, you four will play 3 standard rounds of "Hearts" moderated by the host.
- I'm not explaining how to play hearts here. Go look it up. Yes, you can shoot the moon.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- After 3 rounds, you will deal a powerful attack to the loser. Everyone else will be granted an autovest for one defense level higher than normal.
- Your targets will be roleblocked.
- Your targets will appear to visit you
- All player identities will be anonymous to everyone else except you.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Play at least one game of hearts with everyone alive at the end
